Title: Measurement of the νμ charged-current quasielastic cross section on carbon with the ND280 detector at T2K
Source: Phys Rev D Part Fields Gravit Cosmol
Abstract: © 2015 authors. Published by the American Physical Society.This paper reports a measurement by the T2K experiment of the νμ charged current quasielastic (CCQE) cross section on a carbon target with the off-axis detector based on the observed distribution of muon momentum (pμ) and angle with respect to the incident neutrino beam (θμ). The flux-integrated CCQE cross section was measured to be «σ
